item.title: Turkish Carrot and Lentil Soup
item.description: The bulghur and lentils add some body and protein to this smokey, comforting soup. Add a cautious pinch or two of cayenne at the end; it can be potent stuff. This recipe is from a Riverford soup bag. Ingredients 1 onion 2 red peppers 400g carrots 1 garlic clove 1 bay leaf 1 tsp paprika 2 tsp cumin 40g red lentils 20g bulghur wheat 20g flaked almonds 1 lemon 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper fresh mint Method Peel and slice the onion.
